code: import React from'react';import'../App.css';import Header from'./Header';import DrumKeys from'./DrumKeys';function App(){var data=[{id:'snare',letter:'Q',src:'https://www.myinstants.com/media/sounds/snare.mp3'},{id:'bass 1',letter:'W',src:'https://www.myinstants.com/media/sounds/bass-drum.mp3'},{id:'bongo',letter:'E',src:'http://tipiwiki.free.fr/snd/Percussion(4e)2.wav'},{id:'tom tom',letter:'A',src:'http://www.denhaku.com/r_box/sr16/sr16tom/loelectm.wav'},{id:'bass 3',letter:'S',src:'http://billor.chsh.chc.edu.tw/sound/bass4.wav'},{id:'shotgun',letter:'D',src:'http://david.guerrero.free.fr/Effects/ShotgunReload.wav'},{id:'high hat',letter:'Z',src:'http://www.denhaku.com/r_box/tr707/closed.wav'},{id:'drum hit',letter:'X',src:'http://www.masterbits.de/sc_docu/sounds1/1TM00013.MP3'},{id:'laser',letter:'C',src:'http://www.sa-matra.net/sounds/starcontrol/Umgah-Backzip.wav'}];return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"App"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Header,{title:"Drum Machine"}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{id:"drum-pads"},data.map(function(d){return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(DrumKeys,{key:d.id,id:d.id,letter:d.letter,src:d.src});})));}export default App;
